us.phonetic: /v. ˈriˌkæp, riˈkæp; n. ˈriˌkæp/, (v. rē′kap′, rē kap′; n. rē′kap′; rē′kap′ for 2)

example.eg: Many TV shows include a recap of previous episodes at the beginning.
example.egtrans: 许多电视剧都会在每集的开头扼要重述一下上一集的剧情。

example.eg: Melissa recapped the main points of her presentation for the audience.
example.egtrans: 梅丽莎向听众扼要重述了自己报告的主要内容。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 扼要重述，再次简要概述

example.eg: There's been an awful lot of information in this seminar, so I'll just recap quickly.
example.egtrans: 这次研讨会中讲到了许多的信息，我来快速总结一下。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 总结, 概括, 概述
